        When called this will try to free any memory that is not being used. The goal of this method is to reduce the memory footprint of the class, but it is not guaranteed to free anything when the method is called.

        Overrides:

      • isRenderThread

        public final boolean isRenderThread()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Returns true if the current thread is the thread that the context is attached to, false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isRenderThread in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:
        true if the current thread is the render thread, false otherwise.

      • queueEvent

        public final void queueEvent​(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Queues an event to be executed on the render thread during the next pump. Enqueuing an event will automatically trigger a refresh.

        If this context is a child context, the runnable is queued on the main context's event queue.

        Specified by:
        queueEvent in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Overrides:
        queueEvent in class android.opengl.GLSurfaceView
        Parameters:
        r - The event runnable

      • requestRefresh

        public final void requestRefresh()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Requests that the renderer refresh. This call is a no-op if continuous rendering is enabled.

        If this context is a child context, requests a refresh on the main context from which it derives.

        Specified by:
        requestRefresh in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>

      • setFrameRate

        public final void setFrameRate​(float rate)
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Set the target frame rate. If 0f is specified, the frame rate will not be constrained.

        Note that the maximum possible frame rate may be constrained by the device hardware.

        If this context is a child context, sets the frame rate on the main context from which it derives.

        Specified by:
        setFrameRate in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Parameters:
        rate - The target frame rate, in frames-per-second. If 0f, the renderer will not constrain the frame rate

      • getFrameRate

        public final float getFrameRate()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Returns the current target frame rate.

        If this context is a child context, returns the frame rate setting of the main context from which it derives.

        Specified by:
        getFrameRate in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:
        The current target frame rate.

      • setContinuousRenderEnabled

        public final void setContinuousRenderEnabled​(boolean enabled)
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Sets whether ot not continuous rendering is enabled. When enabled, the renderer will continously render frames, at the configured frame rate. When disabled, the renderer will only render frames on request.

        If this context is a child context, set the continuous render state of the main context from which it derives.

        Specified by:
        setContinuousRenderEnabled in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable continuous rendering, false to disable

      • isContinuousRenderEnabled

        public final boolean isContinuousRenderEnabled()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Returns true if continuous rendering is enabled, false if disabled.

        If this context is a child context, returns the continuous render state of the main context from which it derives.

        Specified by:
        isContinuousRenderEnabled in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:
        true if continuous rendering is enabled, false if disabled.

        Specified by:

      • createChildContext

        public final RenderContext createChildContext()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Creates a new RenderContext that is a child of this RenderContext. Graphics resources may be shared between a child context and its parent, but only in a thread-safe manner.

        When the child context is no longer needed, RenderContext.destroyChildContext(RenderContext) should be invoked.

        Specified by:
        createChildContext in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:
        The child context or null if this RenderContext does not support child contexts.

        Destroys the specified child context created by this RenderContext.
        Specified by:
        destroyChildContext in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Parameters:
        child - A child context created by this RenderContext

      • isAttached

        public final boolean isAttached()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Returns true if the context is currently attached to a thread, false otherwise.

        Note: This method will always return true for a main context.

        Specified by:
        isAttached in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:

      • attach

        public final boolean attach()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Attaches the context to the current thread. This method may detach the context from another thread if it is currently attached.

        Note: A main context may not be attached to any thread other than the main rendering thread.

        Specified by:
        attach in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:
        true if the context is attached to the current thread when the method returns, false otherwise.

      • detach

        public final boolean detach()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Detaches the context from its currently attached thread.

        Note: A main context may not be detached.

        Specified by:
        detach in interface RenderContext<RenderSurface>
        Returns:

      • isMainContext

        public final boolean isMainContext()
        Description copied from interface: RenderContext
        Returns true if the context is a main context. A main context is always attached to a thread, has a render surface and may not be detached.
        Specified by:
